p: The perchlorates of amphiphiles 9, 15, 22, 27, and 32 were obtained from the corresponding bromides by treating with excess of conc. HClO 4 according to the procedure elaborated by Turovska et al. [ 44]. In some cases, the perchlorates were used for obtaining solid salts while the corresponding bromides existed as oils, and it was not possible to isolate them from the reaction mixture.
